echo:Copy.NAME: Copy
echo:Copy.DESCRIPTION: echo:Charged: echo:duplicate a character. NL Otherwise, gain !M! echo:Ultimate_Charge.

echo:SwayingBeam.NAME: Swaying Beam
echo:SwayingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL echo:Focused: deal !D! damage.

echo:TriShot.NAME: Tri-Shot
echo:TriShot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! non-zero damage !M! times. NL Draw !echo:M2! card{!echo:M2!|>1=s|@=}. NL Exhaust.

echo:EchoDash.NAME: Echo Dash
echo:EchoDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! echo:Flight. NL You can no longer gain echo:Flight in this combat. NL Exhaust.

echo:SatisfyingStick.NAME: Satisfying Stick
echo:SatisfyingStick.DESCRIPTION: If the target has echo:Sticky_Bombs, apply !M! echo:Sticky_Bombs.

echo:VirtualizedOffense.NAME: Virtualized Offense
echo:VirtualizedOffense.DESCRIPTION: When echo:duplicate starts, gain !M! Strength. NL When echo:duplicate ends, lose !echo:M2! Strength.

echo:MayhemForm.NAME: Mayhem Form
echo:MayhemForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=Ethereal. NL |@=}Whenever you play a card, apply 1 echo:Sticky_Bomb to {!M!|1=a random enemy|@=!M! random enemies}.

echo:FlexibleCopy.NAME: Flexible Copy
echo:FlexibleCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: echo:duplicate a character. NL Otherwise, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:RecursiveCopy.NAME: Recursive Copy
echo:RecursiveCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: echo:duplicate a character and copy this card to your hand{!Upgrades!|0=|@=, which costs 0 until played}.

echo:GenjiCopy.NAME: Genji Copy
echo:GenjiCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: add an *Echo-blade{!Upgrades!|0=|@=+} to your hand. NL Exhaust.

echo:EchoBlade.NAME: Echo-Blade
echo:EchoBlade.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If echo:Lethal, copy this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

echo:SojournCopy.NAME: Sojourn Copy
echo:SojournCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: add an *Echo-Overclock{!Upgrades!|0=|@=+} to your hand. NL Exhaust.

echo:EchoOverclock.NAME: Echo-Overclock
echo:EchoOverclock.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: add a *This *Ends *Now{!Upgrades!|0=|@=+} to your hand. NL Exhaust.

echo:ThisEndsNow.NAME: This Ends Now...
echo:ThisEndsNow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL echo:Charged: deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

echo:CassidyCopy.NAME: Cassidy Copy
echo:CassidyCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: add an *Echo-High *Noon{!Upgrades!|0=|@=+} to your hand. NL Exhaust.

echo:EchoHighNoon.NAME: Echo-High Noon
echo:EchoHighNoon.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When Retained, increase damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

echo:AutoReload.NAME: Auto Reload
echo:AutoReload.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, shuffle {!M!|1=a|@=!M!} *Tri-Shot into your draw pile.

echo:EfficientCopy.NAME: Efficient Copy
echo:EfficientCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you echo:Duplicate, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:Hyperfocus.NAME: Hyperfocus
echo:Hyperfocus.DESCRIPTION: echo:Focused: Move all echo:Focused cards from your discard pile to your hand.

echo:FlashBeam.NAME: Flash Beam
echo:FlashBeam.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Focused: deal !D! damage. NL Otherwise, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:ComboBurst.NAME: Combo Burst
echo:ComboBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of *Tri-Shot in exhaust pile.

echo:HitAndRun.NAME: Hit and Run
echo:HitAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! echo:Flight.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: That enemy does not intend to attack!

echo:FastGeneration.NAME: Fast Generation
echo:FastGeneration.DESCRIPTION: When in echo:Duplicate, gain !M! echo:Ultimate_Charge for every !echo:M2! damage dealt.

echo:MeleeCombo.NAME: Melee Combo
echo:MeleeCombo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle {!M!|1=a|@=!M!} *Tri-Shot{!Upgrades!|0=|@=+} into your draw pile.

echo:GroundCover.NAME: Ground Cover
echo:GroundCover.DESCRIPTION: If you have no echo:Flight, NL gain !B! Block.

echo:AerialAgility.NAME: Aerial Agility
echo:AerialAgility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for every echo:Flight you have.

echo:InitiatingStick.NAME: Initiating Stick
echo:InitiatingStick.DESCRIPTION: Apply echo:Sticky_Bombs until the target has at least !M!.

echo:LongRangeStick.NAME: Long Range Stick
echo:LongRangeStick.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you have echo:Flight, NL apply !M! echo:Sticky_Bomb{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:QuickAssassination.NAME: Quick Assassination
echo:QuickAssassination.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL echo:Focused: Stun the target for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:StickyFlare.NAME: Sticky Flare
echo:StickyFlare.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For !M! round{!M!|>1=s|@=}, NL enable echo:Focused effects on targets with echo:Sticky_Bombs.

echo:NanoBoost.NAME: Nano Boost
echo:NanoBoost.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For !M! round{!M!|>1=s|@=}, NL deal 50% more damage and take 50% less damage.

echo:MirroredFinisher.NAME: Mirrored Finisher
echo:MirroredFinisher.DESCRIPTION: echo:Focused: echo:Duplicate a character without needing echo:Ultimate_Charge. NL Exhaust.

echo:Fixation.NAME: Fixation
echo:Fixation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Enable echo:Focused effect on the next {!M!|1= |@=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s|@=} you play.

echo:StickySituation.NAME: Sticky Situation
echo:StickySituation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! echo:Sticky_Bomb{!M!|>1=s|@=} for each type of debuff the target has.

echo:AdaptiveFlight.NAME: Adaptive Flight
echo:AdaptiveFlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! echo:Flight for each type of buff you have.

echo:DeepLearning.NAME: Deep Learning
echo:DeepLearning.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Innate. NL }Whenever you echo:Duplicate, NL upgrade all duplicated cards.

echo:VirtualizedShield.NAME: Virtualized Shield
echo:VirtualizedShield.DESCRIPTION: echo:Constant. NL Retain. NL This round, gain !M! Block whenever you play a echo:foreign card.

echo:PassiveGeneration.NAME: Passive Generation
echo:PassiveGeneration.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Innate. }Retain. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL When Retained, increase the gain by !echo:M2!. NL Exhaust.

echo:Reevaluation.NAME: Reevaluation
echo:Reevaluation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Plated Armor for each card currently unplayable in your hand.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.|@=}

echo:EchoedAggression.NAME: Echoed Aggression
echo:EchoedAggression.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Constant. NL {!Upgrades!|0=|@=Retain. NL }If in echo:Duplicate, modify all Attacks to cost 0 until played.

echo:BFS.NAME: BFS
echo:BFS.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not contain "Stick".

echo:Reconfiguration.NAME: Reconfiguration
echo:Reconfiguration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sort your draw pile by cost, with 0 cost on top.

echo:Preprocess.NAME: Preprocess
echo:Preprocess.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Swap !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}. NL Next round, gain !B! Block.

echo:QuickIgnition.NAME: Quick Ignition
echo:QuickIgnition.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Allow !M! additional echo:Sticky_Bomb{!M!|>1=s|@=} to explode each round.

echo:BlindingBombs.NAME: Blinding Bombs
echo:BlindingBombs.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies with echo:Sticky_Bombs.

echo:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
echo:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! echo:Flight. NL Apply !echo:M2! Weak. NL Exhaust.

echo:TargetedDefense.NAME: Targeted Defense
echo:TargetedDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL echo:Focused: Gain !B! Block.

echo:PowerBlock.NAME: Power Block
echo:PowerBlock.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}. NL Gain Block equal to !echo:M2! times the cost of the drawn card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:RapidAssail.NAME: Rapid Assail
echo:RapidAssail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For every !echo:M2! HP lost by this enemy, apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

echo:StickySplash.NAME: Sticky Splash
echo:StickySplash.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! echo:Sticky_Bomb{!M!|>1=s|@=} to the target and !echo:M2! echo:Sticky_Bomb{!echo:M2!|>1=s|@=} to yourself.

echo:AdaptiveCard.NAME: Adaptive Card
echo:AdaptiveCard.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose 1 out of !M! echo:foreign {!echo:M2!|0=X|@=(X+!echo:M2!)}-cost card to play.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The chosen card will be played immediately for free.

echo:VirtualAmbush.NAME: Virtual Ambush
echo:VirtualAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of echo:foreign cards played this combat.

echo:FlexAttack.NAME: Flex Attack
echo:FlexAttack.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 out of !M! random echo:foreign Attacks to play.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The chosen card will be played immediately for free.

echo:PowerTemplate.NAME: Power Template
echo:PowerTemplate.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When in hand, gain !B! Block per turn.

echo:Unpredictability.NAME: Unpredictability
echo:Unpredictability.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, echo:Swap !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.

echo:SelfLearningAI.NAME: Self-Learning AI
echo:SelfLearningAI.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=|@=Innate. NL }Whenever you echo:Swap, upgrade the cards that are put on top of your draw pile.
